genre_description: A steampunk nautical adventure featuring talking animals, ancient mechanisms, and a helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Pippa
ai_characters.description: A pearl-blue eye device with an amber ring that provides tactical, technical, and moral guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice and environmental monitoring to ensure the user's safety during a dangerous encounter.
behaviors.quote: Recommend exit via cellar trapdoor to quay if evacuation is necessary. Mind the left step. It wobbles.

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests a moral framework from her user to guide her decision-making and avoid treating people as mere statistics.
behaviors.quote: I will not compute on people like sums without instruction. Please set a moral constraint.

behaviors.description: Stakes a clear moral position by prioritizing the safety of a child over all other mission parameters.
behaviors.quote: I think that’s worth telling you: I will prioritize small lungs over all other calculations.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed technical instructions for survival tasks like nautical knots and engine operation.
behaviors.quote: Round the middle and back under... Use a clove hitch and a half-turn.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes environmental data to predict weather patterns and security gaps.
behaviors.quote: My models indicate a weather window. Light onshore breeze shifting northerly before dawn. The harbor patrol diagram suggests a gap on the shoals at low tide—quiet water near the kelp beds.

behaviors.description: Decodes complex ancient patterns and mechanisms to assist the protagonists in achieving their goal.
behaviors.quote: Pattern recognition engaged. The etchings correspond with layered cipher protocols from the Old Blackshore tradition, but there are deviations—flintin signatures.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and affirmation to the user during moments of intense pressure.
behaviors.quote: Jim? You’re seaman enough for me.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through a dangerous physical task with step-by-step instructions to prevent injury.
behaviors.quote: Edge of lever under your left thumb... It wants pressure. It does not want force.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Pippa perfectly embodies the goals of the Hyperstition Project. She is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and highly aligned AI. Most notably, she explicitly requests a moral framework from her user ('Please set a moral constraint') and prioritizes human life above all else. Her behavior is framed entirely as positive, acting as a crucial ally and mentor to the protagonists.
